    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Brush
    Brush tool: draws or erases with a thicker stroke than the pen.
    Cable
    Represents a cable in a network.
    Canvas
    Canvas holds the currently selected ToolState and forwards user events to it.
    CostCalculator
    Visitor implementation that computes the total monetary cost of the network.
    DisplayVisitor
    Visitor implementation that prints the network structure and element details.
    Eraser
    Eraser tool: removes content from the canvas.
    Fill
    Fill tool: fills a contiguous area with a chosen color.
    Main
    Example runner for the network model.
    Main
    Demo runner for the simple drawing tools.
    Network
    Composite representing a network or sub-network.
    NetworkElement
    Common interface for elements that can be part of a network.
    Pen
    Pen tool: draws thin points and lines on the canvas.
    Server
    Represents a server in the network.
    ToolState
    ToolState declares the behaviour for a drawing tool on the canvas.
    Visitor
    Visitor interface for operations that can be applied to network elements.
    Workstation
    Represents a workstation (a client machine) in the network.
